document_data.mainbody:
Tornsar Alley was a small side alley that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Tornsar Alley was located in the central section of Waterdeeps Southern Ward. The alley ran east to west, connecting Buckle Street in the west with the Rising Ride in the east just south of Caravan Court.
A portion of the House of Good Spirits was located along Tornsar Alley.
